MCQ: What is the definition of machine learning according to Arthur Samuel?
Choices: a: A field of study that gives computers the capability to learn with human assistance | b: A field of study that gives computers the capability to learn without being explicitly programmed | c: A field of study that gives computers the capability to learn only with structured data | d: A field of study that gives computers the capability to learn by trial and error

MCQ: Which type of machine learning task involves providing personalized recommendations?
Choices: a: Supervised Machine Learning | b: Unsupervised Machine Learning | c: Reinforcement Machine Learning | d: All of the above

MCQ: What type of machine learning can be used to improve recommendation-based systems based on feedback from the environment?
Choices: a: Supervised Machine Learning | b: Unsupervised Machine Learning | c: Reinforcement Machine Learning | d: None of the above

MCQ: Which career path involves using machine learning as a key tool to make predictions and uncover patterns in data?
Choices: a: Data scientist | b: AI engineer | c: Software developer | d: Database administrator

MCQ: What are some key skills required for a data scientist?
Choices: a: Statistical analysis, Programming (Python, R), Machine learning | b: Data visualization, Problem-solving, SQL | c: Hadoop, spark, Tableau | d: All of the above
